headline.main: ALLIES PRESS HARD FOR SYRIA DECISION; Augment Forces for Victory Drive While Increasing Efforts for Armistice

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, July 2 -- Allied aerial and ground reinforcements now arriving in Syria, intensifed British bombing operations, and the change in the British Middle East Command all point to an immediate all-out offensive to smash Vichy's resistance or force an armistice so as to end the Syrian campaign quickly, according to usually well-informed foreign military sources here tonight.
